text: Thomas Edward Hulce (born December 6, 1953) is an American actor and singer known for voicing Quasimodo in The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1996) and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart from Amadeus (1984). ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 births Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Gay men Category:Actors from Detroit Category:Living people
title: Tom Hulce
